channel.title: stuff on I/O Error
channel.description: Recent content in stuff on I/O Error

item.title: Update 2
item.description: This is about all I’m gonna do for the next week. Regular work takes precedent, and I’m much better with back-end than front-end. I have a preference towards no-BS design, but also I’m interested in making it more Brutalist. We’ll see how that goes!

item.title: Update
item.description: I don’t know what I’m doing, but it looks better, I think. I mean, better-ish. Emphasis on the “ish” here. The default font isn’t what I want, the colors are all off, CSS is not something I practice daily, so this is all… well, you know.
